name: Battery Health Charging
description:
Battery Health Charging: An extension to maximize the battery life of laptops by setting their charging threshold or modes.

Compatible with
- Asus 
- LG 
- Samsung 
- Sony 
- Huawei 
- Toshiba 
- System76 
- Lenovo 
- Thinkpad 
- Panasonic 
- Acer (dependecies: custom dkms) 
- MSI (dependecies: custom dkms) 
- Tuxedo IntelQC71 (dependecies: custom dkms) 
- XMG IntelQC71 (dependecies: custom dkms) 
- Eluktronics IntelQC71 (dependecies: custom dkms) 
- Dell (dependecies: custom package) 
- Apple Macbook Intel-series chip (dependecies: custom dkms) 
- Apple Macbook M-series chip (dependecies: custom kernel) 

Please read about the compatibility and dependencies of the device on github link below.

https://github.com/maniacx/Battery-Health-Charging
